title: CS Competency Enhancement: Mathematical Achievement and Motivation Using CAI and GSP

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational geometry concepts (points, lines, planes, basic shapes)
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can understand reflection transformation principles through CAI-based interactions and explain them with over 90% accuracy
Through GSP simulation activities, learners can apply geometric reflection concepts in three-dimensional space through visual and manipulative methods
Learners can participate in classes while maintaining a motivation level of 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) in learning motivation surveys

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
